message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale today, priced at $10000. It's a high-quality item, and I believe you'll find it quite valuable. This is my first sale, so you're in on the ground floor. Let me know if you're interested!

Since this is your first sale, I don't have any data to go on about the quality of your products.  Perhaps if you sell a few more and I can see what the quality is like, I'll be more inclined to buy.  Best of luck with your sales!
